simplified_text:
Spending hours mindlessly scrolling through the internet can be a waste of time. 

If you want to stop getting sucked into entertainment sites, try finding something better to do. 

This will help you focus better and not get distracted so easily. Plus, you might actually discover what it feels like to truly live, instead of just going through the motions. 

**PAGE SUMMARY:** To avoid wasting time on entertainment sites, find better activities that help you focus. This can lead to a more fulfilling life where you truly experience living, not just existing.
